title: Who benefits- actual inflation lower than expected

content.question: Last year both a borrower and a lender expected an inflation rate of 3 percent when they signed a long-term loan agreement with fixed nominal interest rates of 5 percent. If the actual inflation rate were lower than expected, then which of the following would be true?

choices.label: The real interest rate would be lower than expected.
The nominal interest rate would be higher than expected.
The nominal interest rate would increase.
